net.jhoogland.jautomata.operations

Class AcceptorIntersection<L,K>

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jhoogland.jautomata.AbstractAutomaton<L3,K>
      • net.jhoogland.jautomata.operations.Intersection<L,L,L,K>
        • net.jhoogland.jautomata.operations.AcceptorIntersection<L,K>
  • Type Parameters:
    L - label type
    K - weight type (Boolean for regular automata and Double for weighted automata)
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Automaton<L,K>

    public class AcceptorIntersection<L,K>
extends Intersection<L,L,L,K>
    Implementation of acceptor intersection. The weight of every string is the product of the weights of that string in the operand acceptors. In the case of unweighted acceptors, the intersection accepts a string if and only if it is accepted by both operands.
    Author:
    Jasper Hoogland
